project_abstract.cdata: The project will provide, over a five year disbursement period, agricultural inputs and social and economic infrastructure for about 135 newly established ujamaa villages in Kigoma region. The projects objectives would be (a) to lift the annual per capita income of villagers from present levels of US $20.0 to about US $40.0, (b) to develop or strengthen marketing, credit, extension and adaptive research sytems in the region, and (c) to improve the levels of social services in rural areas.
